                                java.lang.Class<T> classType)
                         throws java.lang.InstantiationException
        Creates a class instance with an empty argument list
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class or interface to return
        Parameters:
        className - Name of the specific class to instantiate
        classType - Class or interface to cast object to
        Returns:
        T The object instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException - for any error creating or casting object

      • getInstance

                                java.lang.Class<T> classType,
                                java.util.Properties properties)
                         throws java.lang.InstantiationException

      • getClass

        public static <T> java.lang.Class<? extends T> getClass(java.lang.String className,
                                                        java.lang.Class<T> classType)
                                                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                        java.lang.ClassCastException
        Convienence function for getting a class and doing a runtime casting check
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class or interface to return
        Parameters:
        className - Name of the specific class to instantiate
        classType - Class or interface to cast object to
        Returns:
        Class The requested class, properly cast
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if specified class does not exist or is not of classType
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if specified class does not match requested class or interface
